snippet: Technology sectors like mobile security, data analytics and storage companies and mobile payment systems, which previously elicited a shrug, are suddenly finding millions of dollars of investment coming at them.
abstract: Technology sectors like mobile security, data analytics and storage companies and mobile payment systems, which previously elicited a shrug, are suddenly finding millions of dollars of investment coming at them.

headline.main: Wallflowers of Silicon Valley Get Asked to Dance
headline.print_headline: Wallflowers of Silicon Valley Get Asked to Dance
